dict.acceptation: 店员；办事员，职员；书记员；<古>牧师，教士；

sent.orig: At the clerk's office Hurstwood swung the register about while the clerk came forward.
sent.trans: 在帐房间里，赫斯渥把登记簿转过来时，帐房走上前来。

sent.orig: I started out as a clerk and two years later I'm still a clerk!
sent.trans: 我开始是文员，两年后之后，我还是个办事员！

sent.orig: Entry level positions such as stock clerk receiving clerk, display person, warehouse person.
sent.trans: 初级水平，如股票办事员，仓库管理员。

sent.orig: METHODS: Marketing Grid theory was put forward through analyzing the present wrong-position of drugstore clerk.
sent.trans: 方法：通过对目前药店店员工作角色错位的分析，建立药店店员的销售方格理论。
